channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1483652246701318150
item.description: #AzucenaxMilenio | En cuanto a casos activos, hoy se reportan 286 mil 879 personas enfermas de #COVID19, de los cuales de acuerdo con datos abiertos de la secretaría de salud, el 6.2% son menores de 18 años https://t.co/vP3FlijTQa

item.title: #es @ 1483620585460715524
item.description:

#TomeloEnCuenta estas cifras provienen de los #DatosAbiertos y que podrían cambiar con el devenir de los días https://t.co/u7GTynGYEr

item.title: #es @ 1483599304279404552
item.description:

Es preciso señalar que las cifras se van actualizando a diario vía #DatosAbiertos
Promedio diario actual es de 70📈 https://t.co/vDY6ToObxs

item.title: #en @ 1483580383228739587
item.description:
There's been lots of news coverage about what the Russian military has been up to recently, so I wrote about it in the only way I know how: with satellite images and open data.
Read along for some strange open source bedfellows: weapons and wildfires 🔥🔥https://t.co/TO4GADXfJ1

item.title: #ja @ 1483565312507146241
item.description:
トンガの火山噴火に対してMaxarのOpen Data Programが始まったらしいです。 今回の災害に関する画像をCC BY-NC 4.0 ライセンスで使用することが可能に！ こういう取り組みは広がって欲しいなと思う。
https://t.co/Rqatk3rsle

item.title: #en @ 1483536011162439683
#en @ 1483530122883846144
item.description: My Great Grandma Rosemary was the fiercest person I ever met. She fought for what she believed in (primarily women's rights) all the way to the age of 94. She could focus a room with little effort and gain the friendship of anyone. Still trying to be more like her every day. https://t.co/fVJDP6KUpO

item.title: #en @ 1483485404191985669
item.description: If you or a loved one are hospitalized with #COVID19 the treatment options can be very complicated, and drugs are scarce. The @NIH regularly updates tracking of #SARSCoV2 variants vs treatments, so you can see what works. Here you go: https://t.co/lKdPU8J4D9

item.title: #es @ 1483483028840083458
item.description:
#Hilo Me eché un clavado en los datos abiertos de contagios #COVID19. @SSalud_mx registra +250 mil contagios en niños y adolescentes hasta el 12 de enero.
El reportaje completo está en @LaListanews, pero les cuento algunos puntos importantes:
👇🏽👇🏽👇🏽 https://t.co/xZJzpBRYXO

item.title: #mr @ 1483465589196988417
item.description: ओपन डेटा सप्ताहाचा एक भाग म्हणून, पुणे स्मार्ट सिटी डेव्हलपमेंट कॉर्पोरेशन लिमिटेड यांनी दि. २१ जानेवारी २०२२ रोजी “ओपन डेटा डे” साजरा करण्याचे योजिले आहे. @AmritMahotsav @SmartCities_HUA @MoHUA_India @SmartPune #AzadiKaAmritMahotsav #AmritMahotsav #Data #OpenData (१/२) https://t.co/fB0MJSlbaD

item.title: #en @ 1483464681406750726
item.description: @UBC @ubcprez City Cambridge’s open data portal shows only a handful of projects approved since they approved their ‘100% affordable housing overlay policy’. Policy absent sound urban land economics is just fairy tales and unicorns.

item.title: #it @ 1483385133013028865
item.description: @RobertoBurioni @marcocattaneo Questione di come vengono registrati gli 89enni che hanno fatto 90 anni nel 2021 molto probabilmente. Nella base Istat sono considerati 80-89 anni, negli open data probabilmente come 90+.

item.title: #fi @ 1483383720774090753
item.description: Ei tämä nyt ihan lievältä vaikuta. Etelä-Afrikassa koronaan kuolleiden määrä edelleen kasvaa, vaikka tartuntakäyrä kääntyi alaspäin jo jouluna. Suomen koronaan menehtyneet viimeisen neljän viikon ajalta 17.1.: 95 (tuorein) 67 73 31 Viive 15 päivää, lähde THL:n avoin data. https://t.co/9HAOvtk8JI

item.title: #en @ 1483382881582034947
item.description:
A piece of my PhD dissertation is out as a new paper with @ssdawes 🤩
We analyzed roles and relations among actors in an #OpenData ecosystem through an ERGM network analysis. Government has a key role in the case of @OpenCoesione.
#OpenAccess for 50 days https://t.co/z54sDc0bTm https://t.co/u1VnG1yaL4

item.title: #it @ 1483354066302423044
item.description: Una senatrice grillina ha organizzato un convegno chiamato “Per una PA trasparente. Dati aperti per il decisore politico”. I dati erano talmente aperti che uno dei partecipanti, tale Alex Spence, ha proiettato un bel video porno. Il “decisore politico” dice che è un hacker…

item.title: #en @ 1482874282518753280
item.description: One of the biggest problems in the field of oncology and cancer research in 2022 is lack of open data sharing from clinical outcomes databases that incorporate demographics, genomics, & therapeutics. Government, industry, professional societies & universities should address this. https://t.co/9bzMucJiEV

item.title: #fr @ 1482864381557886984
item.description:
Fin de live Twitch, à partir des données open-data de l'Assemblé Nationale j'ai commencé à modéliser les interactions entre députés. Savoir quels députés vote "pour" ensemble et quels députés vote "contre" ensemble.
C'est que les débuts de l'analyse. ;)
Si vous avez des idées? https://t.co/0gv4FJfTLa
